info.name: The Celestial
info.description: The Celestial Otherworldly Patron from NOS

description.p: Your patron is a powerful being of the Upper Planes. You have bound yourself to an ancient empyrean, solar, ki-rin, or unicorn or to another entity that resides in the planes of everlasting bliss. Your pact with that being allows you to experience the barest touch of the holy light that illuminates the multiverse.

Being connected to such power can cause changes in your behavior and beliefs. You might find yourself driven to annihilate the undead, to defeat fiends, and to protect the innocent. At times, your heart might also be filled with a longing for the celestial realm of your patron, a desire to wander that paradise for the rest of your days. But you know that your mission is among mortals for now and that your pact binds you to bring light even to the darkest places.

sheet.description: You have made your pact with a Celestial.

description.p: The Celestial lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

td.em: guardian of faith, wall of fire

sheet.description: The Celestial lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell.

description.p: At 1st level, the touch of your patrons heavenly might bestows you with two additional eldritch invocations.

At 6th level, you gain the ability to channel celestial energy to heal wounds. You have a pool of d6s that you spend to fuel this healing. The number of dice in the pool equals {{healing light:mod}} + your warlock level.

As a bonus action, you can heal one creature you can see within 60 feet of you, spending dice from the pool. The maximum number of dice you can spend at once equals your level. Roll the dice you spend, add them together, and restore a number of hit points equal to the total.
Your pool regains all expended dice when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: As a bonus action, you can use {{healing light:dice pool}} d6s to heal an ally you can see within 60 feet. The maximum number of dice you can use at once is {{healing light:max uses}}.

description.p: Starting at 10th level, your link to the Celestial infuses you with even more of his heavenly energy. You have resistance to radiant damage and necrotic damage. Also your patron bestow upon you a pair of spectral wings. You gain a flying speed of 30 feet.

sheet.description: You gain resistance to radiant and necrotic damage damage. You gain a pair of spectral wings.

description.p: At 14th level, you can assume the form of an angelic avenger. Using your action, you undergo a transformation. For 1 minute, you gain the following benefits:

ul.li: You become resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks.
You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
You are immune to the charmed and frightened conditions.
You lose all levels of exhaustion, and you cannot be exhausted.
Your angelic form lasts for 1 minute. It ends early if you are knocked unconscious. You can also end your angelic form on your turn as a bonus action.

description.p: You can use this feature twice per long rest.

sheet.description: For 1 minute, you gain the following benefits: You become resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks. You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects. You are immune to the charmed and frightened conditions. You lose all levels of exhaustion, and you cannot be exhausted.

description.p: Beginning at 1st level, you can hold your breath indefinitely, and you don't require food, water, or sleep, although you still require rest to reduce exhaustion and still benefit from finishing short and long rests.
In addition, you age at a slower rate. For every 10 years that pass, your body ages only 1 year, and you are immune to being magically aged.
